# Statistics

Various statistical methods using built-in and custom implementations in R, Python, and C++.

```{r}
toc_df <- tibble(
  ` ` = c(
    rep("Essential Tasks", 2),
    rep("Central Tendency", 3),
    rep("Dispersion", 2)
    ),
  Topic = c(
    build_link("length", "mean/"),
    build_link("sum", "mean/"),
    build_link("mean", "mean/"),
    build_link("median", "median/"),
    build_link("mode", "mode/"),
    build_link("variance", "variance/"),
    build_link("standard_deviation", "standard-deviation/")
    ),
  r_icon = c(
    build_link("R", "mean/#length"),
    build_link("R", "mean/#sum"),
    build_link("R", "mean/#r"),
    build_link("R", "median/#r"),
    build_link("R", "mode/#r"),
    build_link("R", "variance/#r"),
    build_link("R", "standard_deviation/#r")
    ),
  rcpp = c(
    build_link("Rcpp", "mean/#length-1"),
    build_link("Rcpp", "mean/#sum-1"),
    build_link("Rcpp", "mean/#rcpp"),
    build_link("Rcpp", "median/#rcpp"),
    build_link("Rcpp", "mode/#rcpp"),
    build_link("Rcpp", "variance/#rcpp"),
    build_link("Rcpp", "standard_deviation/#rcpp")
    ),
  py = c(
    build_link("Python", "mean/#length-2"),
    build_link("Python", "mean/#sum-2"),
    build_link("Python", "mean/#python"),
    build_link("Python", "median/#python"),
    build_link("Python", "mode/#python"),
    build_link("Python", "variance/#python"),
    build_link("Python", "standard_deviation/#python")
    ),
  shootout = c(
    "",
    "",
    "",
    build_link("Shootout", "median/#shootout"),
    build_link("Shootout", "mode/#shootout"),
    "",
    ""
  )
  ) %>% 
  set_names(c(" ", "Topic", build_icon("r"), build_icon("rcpp"), build_icon("py"),
              build_icon("shootout")))
```
